data.title: Kumuyi's Taraba crusade: 70 US, UK doctors volunteer free medical services
data.meta_description: The Taraba state overseer of the Deeper Life Bible Church, Pastor Samuel Omajali, weekend, said over 70 medical doctors from the United States of America (USA) and the United Kingdom (UK) have volunteered to render free medical services as support to the upcoming Global Crusade of the General Superintendent,…
data.text:
The Taraba state overseer of the Deeper Life Bible Church, Pastor Samuel Omajali, weekend, said over 70 medical doctors from the United States of America (USA) and the United Kingdom (UK) have volunteered to render free medical services as support to the upcoming Global Crusade of the General Superintendent, Deeper Life Bible Church, Pastor WF Kumuyi in Taraba state.

Omajali, who stated this while briefing journalists in Jalingo said the Global Crusade would hold at Wukari town from 28th March to 2nd April, 2024.

He noted that the doctors and other medical personnel are coming to render free medical services to residents of Wukari and those from neighbouring communities.

“They are coming from the United States of America, United Kingdom and they are coming from various states in America like Chicago and their leader is a white lady.

Some of them are citizens of the US or UK and some are drawn from Lagos and other states in Nigeria,” he said.

The clergy, who described the theme of the crusade as, “The All-Sufficient Jesus” noted that Pastor WF Kumuyi has been so passionate about helping souls to know the right way that can lead them to heaven.

“Multitudes are suffering, perishing, and the man of God is coming to give attention to them to proffer salvation, healing, deliverance, among others.

“The visitors are coming with their drugs and equipments and they will be spending one week in Wukari where free medical services as pledged would be rendered and drugs would be dispensed where necessary, people would receive spiritual counseling and Bible teaching.

He added that the medical personnel are the types that have the passion to help the sick and people that are vulnerable.
